archimate:Deliverable.name: Application role to entity/attribute CRUD Matrix
archimate:Deliverable.documentation: Define what events trigger the creation of a new instance of an entity , the possible transitions to different states it can exist in. The criteria for when data must be removed from systems. A state model. CRUD matrix identifies which which role in each application performs each operation on each data entiry attribute(s). Provides lineage from Information systems architecture to technology architecture.
